channel.title: Lost file help
channel.description:
hey i was downloading a 4gb file an i got about half way when we had a power cut :( is there anyway i can continue the download from that point an if so how?
like were does the file get saved if its only half done cos i cant see it in the place i saved it :confused:
thanks for reading this
Edit: o an yes i did try searching for it lol

item.title: Lost file help
item.dc:creator: @BobDole81 BobDole81
item.description:
@BobDole81 wrote:

Depends where you what you were using to download. Many browsers would just delete the temporary file if the transmission was interrupted (but if your computer shut down with warning it may not have). Resuming downloads depends entirely on the download client and server though. If you were using a browser, I’d say you probably will have to restart the download. Take a look for a download manager, as they will typically allow pausing and resuming downloads.

Read full topic
